<title>About</title>
<nowiki>
  <br>
  <table width="100%" cellpadding="5">
    <tr>
      <td width="20%">
        &nbsp;
      </td>
      <td>
        <p>
          System.Data.SQLite is an ADO.NET adapter for
          <a href="http://www.sqlite.org/">SQLite</a>.
        </p>
        <p>System.Data.SQLite was started by Robert Simpson.  Robert still
          has commit privileges on this repository but is no longer an
          active contributor.  Development and maintenance work is now
          mostly performed by the SQLite Development Team.  The SQLite team
          is committed to supporting System.Data.SQLite long-term.
        </p>
        <p>
          Historical versions, as well as the original support forums, may still
          be found at
          <a href="http://sqlite.phxsoftware.com/">http://sqlite.phxsoftware.com/</a>,
          though there have been no updates to this version since April of 2010.
        </p>
        <p>
          There is no forum on this web site; however, the
          <a href="support.wiki">support page</a> has an updated list of support
          options.
        </p>
        <p>
          Please refer to the
          <a href="downloads.wiki">download page</a> for a complete list of
          downloadable packages and information on their use.
        </p>
      </td>
